question: I have been experiencing physical and emotional abuse from my spouse for the last two years. He frequently slaps and punches me, controls my finances, and threatens to throw me out of the house if I tell anyone. Recently, the violence has escalated; last week he hit me with a household object, leaving visible injuries, and refused to let me seek medical help. I am afraid for my safety and I also worry about the safety of my children who witness this abuse. Please tell me what legal protections and remedies are available to me, such as restraining orders, shelter options, and criminal charges.
